references.reason: This paper introduced the variational autoencoder (VAE), a generative model fundamental to many subsequent video generation approaches.
This seminal work introduced generative adversarial networks (GANs), another cornerstone in the field of generative modeling, influencing video generation techniques.

references.paper_title: Large scale GAN training for high fidelity natural image synthesis
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced GAN training techniques, leading to improved image quality and influencing advancements in video generation.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which have become a dominant approach in image and video generation.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provided a theoretical framework for score-based generative models, a class of models closely related to DDPMs that have substantially impacted video generation.
